title: HotspotMaterialConfig
description: An instance of a hotspot material.

color.title: Color
color.description: The color of the hotspot if there is no texture.

transparent.title: Transparent
transparent.description: Does the texture needs to renderer transparency (like a PNG) ?

side.title: Side
side.description: The side of the material. Can be front, back or double. See FORGE.HotspotMaterial.sides constants

image.title: Image
image.description: The image configuration that will be used for the texture.

sprite.title: Sprite configuration
sprite.description: The Sprite configuration that will be used for the texture.

video.title: Video configuration
video.description: The Video configuration that will be used for the texture.

plugin.title: Plugin
plugin.description: The plugin UID that will provide a texture property.
